items.title: iOS 26 gave screenshots a hidden power I’ve started using a lot
items.summary:
iOS 26 brings visual intelligence to screenshots, enabling several new features. But there’s one I only recently discovered that solves the common problem of plain text URLs you can’t easily tap to open.

items.title: Apple reportedly pushing back Gemini-powered Siri features beyond iOS 26.4
items.summary: Despite inking a deal with Google to use Gemini AI as the brains behind upgraded Siri, Apple is reportedly facing internal challenges in getting the final product ready for prime time. The reported delays could stretch into iOS 27 this fall. Apple first announced a more capable version of Siri in 20
items.title_translated: 据报道，苹果将推迟 iOS 26.4 之后由 Gemini 驱动的 Siri 功能
items.summary_translated: 尽管与谷歌达成协议，使用 Gemini AI 作为升级 Siri 的大脑，但据报道，苹果在让最终产品为黄金时段做好准备方面面临着内部挑战。据报道，延迟可能会持续到今年秋季的 iOS 27。 Apple 在 20 年首次发布了功能更强大的 Siri 版本

items.title: Hands-on: iOS 26.3 changes and features [Video]

Transfer to Android

items.title: New Siri Runs Into Problems, Features Could Be Pushed to iOS 26.5 and iOS 27
items.summary:
Apple has "run into snags" testing the more personalized, smarter version of Siri that's planned for iOS 26.4, reports Bloomberg. Because of the issues, the upcoming ‌Siri‌ features will be spread across several upcoming iOS releases and won't all come in the spring iOS 26.4 update.




Apple could
items.title_translated: 新 Siri 遇到问题，功能可能推送到 iOS 26.5 和 iOS 27

items.title: Update Now: iOS 26.3 and macOS Tahoe 26.3 Fix Dozens of Security Vulnerabilities
items.summary:
Apple today released iOS 26.3, iPadOS 26.3, and macOS Tahoe 26.3, all of which largely focus on bug fixes and security improvements. Apple says that the updates address dozens of vulnerabilities, including one that is known to have been actively exploited.




That vulnerability in the dyld dynamic

The new software can be downloaded on eligible iPhones and iPads ove

items.title: Could Apple really press pause on new features in iOS 27? [Poll]

items.title: Why Apple's iOS 26.4 Siri Upgrade Will Be Bigger Than Originally Promised
items.summary:
In the iOS 26.4 update that's coming this spring, Apple will introduce a new version of Siri that's going to overhaul how we interact with the personal assistant and what it's able to do.




The iOS 26.4 version of ‌Siri‌ won't work like ChatGPT or Claude, but it will rely on large language models
items.title_translated: 为什么苹果的 iOS 26.4 Siri 升级将比最初承诺的更大

Software "signing" means that it has passed the server-side verifi

Apple just released iOS 26.2.1 this week, but iOS 26.3 is expected to launch soon too. When it does, it will introduce three new ways to customize the iPhone thanks to new settings and wallpaper options.

items.title: Apple Seeds Third Betas of iOS 26.3 and iPadOS 26.3 to Public Beta Testers
items.summary:
Apple today seeded the third betas of upcoming iOS 26.3, iPadOS 26.3, tvOS 26.3, and watchOS 26.3 updates to public beta testers, with the updates coming a day after Apple provided the third beta to developers. 




Anyone can download and install public betas, and all that's required is to sign up
items.title_translated: Apple 向公共 Beta 测试者发布 iOS 26.3 和 iPadOS 26.3 第三个 Beta 版本
items.summary_translated:
苹果今天向公共 Beta 测试人员发布了即将推出的 iOS 26.3、iPadOS 26.3、tvOS 26.3 和 watchOS 26.3 更新的第三个测试版，这些更新是在苹果向开发者提供第三个测试版的第二天发布的。 




任何人都可以下载并安装公共测试版，所需要做的就是注册

items.title: iOS 26 Adoption Hits 50%, But Some Users Are Still Reluctant to Update
items.summary:
iOS 26 adoption now hovers at around 50%, according to StatCounter, but some users are still cautious about updating. 




New data published by SellCell provides a look at how users have responded to the push to update to ‌iOS 26‌. The findings are based on a January 2026 survey of 2,000 U.S.-based
items.title_translated: iOS 26 采用率达到 50%，但部分用户仍不愿更新
items.summary_translated:
根据 StatCounter 的数据，iOS 26 的采用率目前徘徊在 50% 左右，但一些用户仍然对更新持谨慎态度。 




SellCell 发布的新数据让我们了解了用户对更新至 iOS 26 的推动有何反应。该调查结果基于 2026 年 1 月对 2,000 名美国受访者进行的调查
